generated_description: hudson valley community services, legally known as hudson valley community services inc., is a non-profit organization based in the town of mount pleasant, new york. it provides support, access to healthcare, education, and prevention services to residents of hudson valley who live with or are at risk for chronic illnesses. the organization offers a range of services including case management, health home care management, emergency financial services, housing assistance, medical benefits assistance, psychosocial support services, transportation, and food and nutrition programs. it also provides testing services for hiv, stds, and hepatitis c, as well as programs for people who use drugs, men's services, women's services, and hiv prevention. hudson valley community services is a division of cornerstone family healthcare.
